overview: A gritty Neo Noir film set in North Hollywood - San Fernando Valley of Southern California about a Hitman named Sean carrying out an order from Mister Vega to kill Nino, a gay mechanic working at Reggie's Car Repair Shop. A twisted Noir-ish ride with a lot of vintage vibes by filmmaker Alexander Roman and starring Kyle Williams, Jesse Tayeh, and Holgie Forrester
title: Queer Blood
